ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all, I have the following trouble using the Cantera toolbox for Matlab. I need to create a new solution object starting from an existing one. I ve tried

Subject: Copy solution object in Matlab

Dear all,
I have the following trouble using the Cantera toolbox for Matlab.
I need to create a new solution object starting from an existing one.
I've tried to copy the first object using the equal operator (=), but in 
this way the two objects have the same handles. In fact changing 
something in one object, I change also the other one.
Is there some way to create a new solution object starting from a 
previous one with a different handles?

Thank you for your attention,

Michele

--
